# AI Hire Law

> AI hiring compliance platform helping employers navigate AEDT bias audits, impact assessments, and state AI employment laws including NYC Local Law 144, Illinois AIVI Act, Colorado SB 205, and California CCPA/ADMT.

AI Hire Law provides compliance tools, training, and documentation for companies using AI in hiring decisions. Key features include automated compliance tracking, bias audit management, disclosure generation, and state-by-state regulatory guidance.

## Compliance Guides

- [NYC Local Law 144 Guide](https://aihirelaw.com/resources/nyc-local-law-144): AEDT requirements, bias audit timelines, candidate notification templates
- [Illinois AIVI Act Guide](https://aihirelaw.com/resources/illinois-ai-hiring-law): Video interview AI disclosure requirements and consent rules
- [Colorado AI Act for Employers](https://aihirelaw.com/resources/colorado-ai-act-employers): High-risk AI system requirements, impact assessments, adverse action notices
- [California CCPA/ADMT Guide](https://aihirelaw.com/resources/california-ccpa-admt): Automated decision-making technology requirements under CPRA
- [2026 Compliance Checklist](https://aihirelaw.com/resources/compliance-checklist-2026): Comprehensive checklist for all US AI hiring laws

## Glossary

- [AEDT](https://aihirelaw.com/glossary/aedt): Automated Employment Decision Tool - the legal definition and what qualifies
- [Bias Audit](https://aihirelaw.com/glossary/bias-audit): Independent testing for disparate impact, required annually under NYC law
- [Disparate Impact](https://aihirelaw.com/glossary/disparate-impact): Unintentional discrimination through neutral policies, measured by 4/5ths rule
- [Impact Assessment](https://aihirelaw.com/glossary/impact-assessment): Required documentation under Colorado AI Act for high-risk systems
- [High-Risk AI System](https://aihirelaw.com/glossary/high-risk-ai-system): Colorado's classification for AI making consequential employment decisions
- [BIPA](https://aihirelaw.com/glossary/bipa): Illinois Biometric Information Privacy Act - relevant for video interview AI
- [AIVI](https://aihirelaw.com/glossary/aivi): Illinois AI Video Interview Act disclosure requirements
- [Four-Fifths Rule](https://aihirelaw.com/glossary/four-fifths-rule): 80% threshold for measuring adverse impact in selection rates

## State Compliance Pages

- [NYC Compliance](https://aihirelaw.com/compliance/nyc): Local Law 144 requirements and deadlines
- [Illinois Compliance](https://aihirelaw.com/compliance/illinois): AIVI Act and BIPA requirements
- [Colorado Compliance](https://aihirelaw.com/compliance/colorado): SB 205 requirements effective February 2026
- [California Compliance](https://aihirelaw.com/compliance/california): CCPA/CPRA ADMT requirements

## Templates & Tools

- [AI Disclosure Notice Template](https://aihirelaw.com/resources/ai-disclosure-notice-template): Compliant notice language for candidates
- [Vendor Assessment Guide](https://aihirelaw.com/resources/vendor-assessment-guide): Evaluating AI hiring vendors for compliance
- [HR Training Guide](https://aihirelaw.com/resources/hr-training-guide): Training requirements under Colorado AI Act
- [Compliance Scorecard](https://aihirelaw.com/scorecard): Free assessment of your AI hiring compliance status

## Optional

- [Pricing](https://aihirelaw.com/pricing): Subscription plans for compliance management
- [FAQ](https://aihirelaw.com/resources/faq): Common questions about AI hiring compliance
